title: Windows Tech Support Agent
job_overview:
Full-Time Tech Support Agent – Advanced English | Up to $5.50/hr (Work from Home)

Location: Remote (Philippines-based only)
Hours: Full-Time, 40 hours/week
Rate: Up to $5.50/hour, depending on experience

About the Role
We’re looking for a highly skilled Tech Support Agent who’s experienced, dependable, and speaks fluent, near-American English. You’ll be supporting our U.S.-based customers, so clear communication and a neutral accent are critical.

If you’re a problem-solver who loves working with computer hardware and helping people over chat, email, or phone—this is your opportunity to join a company that values long-term relationships and growth.

Requirements
* At least 2 years of tech support experience
* Advanced English (verbal and written) – You must sound almost native
* Fast, reliable internet connection (minimum 25 Mbps)
* High-quality headset and quiet environment
* Deep understanding of Windows 10/11, drivers, and basic hardware
* Ability to work U.S. hours (EST/PST)
* Must be self-motivated, dependable, and proactive

Bonus if you have experience with:
Troubleshooting desktop hardware and PC components

Windows Device Manager and driver installation

Remote desktop support tools

CRM or ticketing systems like Zendesk, Freshdesk, or similar

How to Apply
Record a 2-minute video of yourself

Explain the first six items in Device Manager on a Windows computer

Speak clearly and professionally

Upload the video to Google Drive or YouTube (unlisted) and share the link

Send your resume, speed test result, and headset photo

Include the subject line: "Tech Support Agent – Your Name"

We’re a no-BS team that takes pride in providing excellent support and top-quality products to our customers. If you’ve got the skills, the voice, and the drive—we want to hear from you.
